posts.message:
Just a reminder that you have only 2 hrs to vote for the idea you are interested in :)

https://www.facebook.com/groups/egyptian.geeks/permalink/806109662762077/
posts.description:
Vote for Idea - Deadline 30 of Aug

شكرا للناس اللى شاركت
 خلصت BrainStorming مرحلة الــ
 و بقى عندنا ١٨ فكرة عظيمة ممكن نشتغل على أى واحدة فيهم و ممكن تشوفوهم من هنا
https://github.com/egyptian-geeks/Activities/issues

دلوقتى مرحلة أختيار الفكرة...كل واحد يختار الفكرة اللى حابب إنه يشتغل فيها. 
المفروض يبقى فيه معايير معينة لأختيار الأفكار...لكن انا مش هحط معايير لأن الموضوع محتاج وقت و مشاركة منكم فى تحديد المعايير دى...وهسيب كل واحد يختار الفكرة اللى شايفها مناسبة من وجهة نظرة.

Issue هحط الأفكار بأرقام الــ
 و الفكرة اللى حابب تشتغل فيها حط رقمها فى كومينت

ملحوظة :- 
Poll مستخدمتش فيسبوك
 علشان بيديك حد معين من الأختيارات ١٠ أختيارات و أحنا عندنا ١٨ فكرة فمش هقدر أحطها فى بول على الفيسبوك...و الكومينتات عمليا أحسن من أنى أستخدم أي تول أونلاين

الأفكار كالتالى 

#18 Sys-admin automation  -  http://bit.ly/1zPt9Nu
#17 Map for tech companies shared on google map  - http://bit.ly/1pc1YWS
#16 Egypt administrative areas as open-data - http://bit.ly/1tJh5gQ
#15 Plugin to VLC to save where I stopped in a file - http://bit.ly/1qmrHjj
#14 Graffeti map - http://bit.ly/1u3CUpE
#13 Political Watch System - http://bit.ly/1qasNjl
#12 Tool to create putty themes, or find a better ssh client! - http://bit.ly/1poIh45
#11 Tumblr, but static & hosted - http://bit.ly/1vsH51W
#10 Clone of https://www.djangopackages.com/ but for JS libraries - http://bit.ly/1qmrRXS
#9 Infoq downloader - http://bit.ly/1C8Na5q
#8 Sync reveal.js slide viewing across many clients using firebase - http://bit.ly/1tRoc60
#7 Multi-machine Desktop Search Engine with Web UI based on ElasticSearch - http://bit.ly/1pc32tS
#6 Open-source clone of PushBullet - http://bit.ly/1lk7qvD
#5 Egyptian Geeks Ideas&Discussion Platw - http://bit.ly/1sNyYbH
#4 Orgnizlee - http://bit.ly/1qJoR9m
#3 Mysearch - http://bit.ly/1AZYEH4
#2 Facebook management app - http://bit.ly/1pc3qIF
#1 ArduWeb (Arduino Web-Based framwork)  - http://bit.ly/XXFYtA

كل واحد يختار فكرتين بالكتير و بعد يوم ٣٠ إنشاء الله هنحدد الفكرة اللى هنشتغل عليها و هنشوف مين يقدر يشارك.

posts.caption: 6 October Web Development Bootcamp
posts.description:
6Oct Web Development BootCamp
1st Module: Front End (5-6-8-10 Sep)
2nd Module: Back End (12-13-14-15-16 Sep)
3rd Module: PM & Freelancing (17 Sep)

>>Front End Module:
First Day
- Web Industry Foundation and Factors
- Target your audience for a successful website through 5D and UCD approaches . 
- Create your semantic structure, Layout and animation through HTML5 / CSS3 “Part one”
- What is HTML
- HTML Syntax and Tags 
- What’s new in HTML5 ?
- How to write semantic structure through HTML5
- Useful resources and assets
- Practice and best practices 

Second Day 
- Create your semantic structure, Layout and animation through HTML5 / CSS3 “Part two ”
- What is CSS
- CSS Syntax
- Selectors
- How and where to write CSS 
- What’s new in CSS3
- Useful resources and assets
-How to make responsive layout through frameworks "Bootstrap"
- What is the frameworks ?
- Why Bootstrap ?
- Grid System
- Mobile adaptive and responsive layout 
- media queries and percentage layout calculations
- Practice and best practices 

Third Day 
- Make manipulations and interactive animations through " JQuery "
- Overview and Syntax of jQuery
- Working with the Common Events
- Retrieving and Manipulating Page Content
- JQuery Animations and Effects
- Other common Libraries and Plugins 
- Useful resources and assets
- Practice and best practices

Forth Day 
Project 

>-Back End Development Module:
Day (1)
• Introduction to web development with PHP 
-The architecture of a web application
• How to code a PHP application 
-Basic PHP skills
-How to use the PHP documentation
-Variables 
-Constraints
-Arithmetic Operators
• How to work with strings and numbers 
-How to work with strings
-How to work with numbers
• How to code control statements 
-How to code conditional expressions
-The logic of sign in
• How to work with Forms 
-How to work with super global
-Deal with GET method
-Deal With POST method
• How to code looping statements
-How to code while statement
-How to code For statement
• How to work with cookies and sessions 
-How to work with cookies
-How to work with sessions

Day (2)
• How to create and use arrays 
-How to create and use an array
-How to use functions to work with arrays
• How to create and use functions 
-Basic skills for working with functions
• introduction to MVC 
-Basic of MVC Pattern
• introduction to codeiginter framework 
-How to deal with codeiginter framework
• introduction to OOP 
-An introduction to Classes
-An introduction to functions

Day (3)
• Introduction to relational databases and MySQL 
-An introduction to relational databases
-The SQL statements for data manipulation
-An introduction to MySQL
-How to use phpMyAdmin
• How to use PHP with a MySQL database 
-PHP for working with MySQL
-How to get data from a result set

Day (4)
• Working on Blog System ( Project ) 
-Create the Database
-Create login , signup , add new , update news , delete news , view news and signout

Day (5)
• Introduction to CMS 
-An Wordpress
-Joomla
-Drupal

Day (10)
-Pricing/Sales
-Freelancing

You will need a laptop 

Register Now: http://bit.ly/6OctWebDevCamp

posts.caption: stackoverflow.com
posts.description: i have a big website built by ASP.net and SQL server2014 and it's growing too fast , and have some trouble i faced some of them i found solution for it and some other not. i made a sub-domains for:...

posts.message:
I saw a creepy trend, Like instead of being a developer or sw engineer, or QA Engineer "Engineer in test", I see now a C# Developer or a .Not Developer, and even more radical like ASP CRM Developer or Share Point 2012 Developer and yes he he specifies a version..

What wrong with people ?
يا جماعة أنا عندي مشروع لعبة "دامة التركية" فياريت لو تعرفوا شركات في مصر بتعمل ألعاب و يا ريت كمان لو أتعملت ويب, أدوني أسمها و يا ريت أزاي أوصلها.
